purpose: The email announces a postdoctoral position in Computer Science at Karlstad University, focusing on the OPEHRA project, which aims to integrate human rights into AI-supported digital health systems. The position is intended for candidates who have completed their PhD within the last three years and emphasizes interdisciplinary research, particularly in AI, health, and social care. The email encourages recipients to share the opportunity with potential candidates and provides details about the application process, qualifications, and duties associated with the role.
